price: Ó dá ènìyàn láti inú àtọ̀. (Ènìyàn) sì di olùjiyàn pọ́nńbélé (nípa Àjíǹde).
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-insāna min nuṭ'fatin fa-idhā huwa khaṣīmun mubīnun
